content.detailedDescription: I am an airline pilot. i have flown in the pacific for 23 years. i have never seen before what i saw on the 4th of october, 2014.  the moon was not up.  the sun was 2 hours from coming up. it was a very dark night. we were flying about 1500 miles west of california at the time. i was looking out the windshield and saw a perfectly round, white, cloud-like form.  it appeared to be 80% above the horizon. it looked like a moon rising above the horizon but 4 times as big. the outer edge was brighter than the center. our flight path was taking us through the left edge of the form. the form was a perfect circle. i couldn't tell at first if it was a flat circle or a sphere. as we got closer, it got larger. we were at 39,000 ft. the upper edge of the circle was many thousands of feet higher than we were. i would guess 100,000 ft. or higher. we did fly through the left edge of this. as we got closer it diffused and was harder to see.  there were 2 other aircraft that saw the same object that night. one of the aircrafts was 40 min. ahead of us that saw it. because it was so dark i am not sure why we could see this. normally on moonless nights, clouds and such are not visible. i do know it wasn't the northern lights and it wasn't some strange cloud.
content.summary: A very large white cloud like disk or orb.

content.detailedDescription:
On wednesday, 10-8-14 during our monthly moon observation we detected multiple objects passing in front of and/or seemingly hovering above the moons surface at an unknown altitude. our investigation is ongoing at this time and this report is served to you(mufon)in an effort to assist and/or verify any other reports of this occurrence and to contribute to your ufo database. if you have any further questions, feel free to email us and we will be glad to talk to you.

-- ickes aerospace and defense
content.summary: Unknown object(s) during moon observation

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on my back deck to look at the moon with my binoculars and while looking at the moon saw a black triangle or v shaped object pass in front of the moon from top left to bottom right. i have no idea what is was but it had no lights and appeared to be very near the moon surface. a far as feelings go this was my first ufo sighting and it kind of creeped me out. i lost sight of the object when it was no longer in the face of the moon meaning i lost it in the blackness of the sky.
content.summary: Black v across the face of nearly full moon

content.detailedDescription: A mexican youth who was taken to sav-on drugs in norwalk cali by his dad came out to find various people in the parking lot all standing up with their mouths open looking up at what his dad claimed had been a hovering red sphere which broke into pieces then came back together. my guess is the pieces descended then came back together, not sure if he said the pieces fell then merged together again. apparently the object ascended up out of sight or perhaps faded out of sight if by the time he'd gone out these people were still looking up rather than off into the distance straining to see where it went for example. i got the impression more than four people had witnessed this event.
content.summary: Hovering red sphere broke into pieces then came back together

content.detailedDescription: Husband was outside walking our dog and he called me outside, we saw a diamond shape pattern of lights blinking off and on and going east towards the ocean which is about 20 miles away, it made no noise but the lights were blinking like crazy, it was awesome. i wish i had my camera or phone.
content.summary: Blinking lights in a diamond shape at least 8 lights blinking on and off

content.detailedDescription: I was inside my house with my wife, brother and his daughter. i thought i'd go out into my backyard. so i opened my door which faces east and walked out. i stopped about 6 feet from the door and felt like i needed to look up in the south direction. so i did and then i saw it right there in front of a low cloud. it like came out and went down about 25 feet then left about 25 feet then back then up and back again, then stopped and sat there. i was yelling at my wife and brother to come out here fast now! my wife was the first one yet could not see it cause she did not have her glasses on! then my brother came out and before he could actually look at it, it went into another cloud next to it. the funny thing is these clouds were kind of transparent so i do not know where it went it just went into it and vanished. at the time i saw it, it was a circular object just like a ufo to say. it was of a dark color yet you could see the sun hitting it. so it was there! but the moves were just to quick. it went from a straight down to a left turn in just a split second and did what i said above in the same time. but i did get to see it for the time mentioned above. it makes me wonder if it intended for me to see it. as when i walked out the door i had the urge to look in that direction. but who knows. this was what i saw and was amazed at what it did.
content.summary: Saw it about 500ft. in sky at about 75 degrees

content.detailedDescription: Took a picture. and got that
content.summary: Alien watch me from neibors window

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east and noticed an airplane leaving a prominent trail. i photographed the trail from three different angles. when i looked at the pictures later, there was this white rectangular object in each of the pictures. the trail of the airplane appears to pass between me and the rectangular object.
content.summary: Rectangular white object appeared in a photo of the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife, son and i went outside oct8th at 6:15 am to witness the eclipse. i brought my galaxy3 smart phone. i was taking pictures then i switched to video for 17 seconds. upon going inside i watched my video and was amazed. it was a crystal clear morning. no stars, planes etc. upon viewing my video frame by frame. i was startled. i actually have a bright white lite coming out of a porthole wormhole? it then accelerated ascended descended left came back 3 times all within 3 seconds. i have the video& pics of a round object with 5 circular white lites that turned yellow then red then white again. i am still amazed i get chills seeing my video frame by frame everything is so clear. i choose to attach 3 images but they really dont do this event justice. i have 70 images from 3 seconds.
content.summary: Round ship with 5 lights

content.detailedDescription: I came out from mosque and then i noticed this humming sound from the sky i looked and i saw a triangle with exterior light pulsing i thought it was a helicopter but the it moved going west then it went south and stopped then it hovered for a minute the it let out a orange light and it shot up in to the sky then it disappeared i was arguing with my brothers and my sister they all said it was a helicopter i knew it was't because of the humming sound it was so loud it could be from inside the mosque i was nervous but also i was excited. i first noticed the object from it sound. it moved around hovering above 500ft or so then as i got in to the car it let a bright pulsating orange light then my brothers and my sister believed that it was something from out of space. i lost contact from it after it raced off at a 1000mph
content.summary: It was shaped like a triangle when it hovered and orange light shoot up into the sky and then the triangle disappered

content.detailedDescription: I have an outdoor location that i use nightly for meditation and sky watching. i have had many sighting of lights moving very high in the sky, much to high for an airplane, some of which are likely satellites but it is impossible to tell. however, last night as i was preparing to begin mediation i saw what looked like a large undefined black spot, almost looked like static on a monitor, emerging from a large cloud. i actually rubbed my eyes twice trying to make sense of what i was seeing. as it moved closer the the static dissipated revealing a very large disc, my best guess at size would be approximately 100ft across, and the dark color gradually lightened until it was exactly matched to the cloud it emerged from, a flat primer looking grey  and it progressively came into sharper and sharper focus. it became sharp in focus but never fully became totally solid, it had a "cloaked' look to it, i couldn't see through it, but it had a transparency at the same time. after it emerged from the cloud it made a wide arc in it's decent to the left turning fully sideways and flattened back out as it moved back to the right, it's path would've drawn a "c", it came to a brief stop and hovered for only a moment. at its lowest point and closest point to me it would've been only a couple of hundred feet away from me. after the very brief moment that it hovered it began ascending straight up in a spiral path directly into the brightness of the moon. as it ascended it became progressively more transparent until it was no longer visible. unfortunately, it happened and was over so fast i was unable to get any video or photos. i decided to make the report in the event it would provide some corroboration for anyone else saw it, if anyone else did see it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Clear unambiguous sighting of large disc

content.detailedDescription: Was outside smoking. looked up saw a bright white light moving south to north. no tail was observed. light moved very fast with no sound. lost sight as it crossed roofline of a building. lack of a tail and direction of flight make me question what it was. very short event 2 to 3 seconds. please note glowed comment was only added because could not submit report without some comment in that area of the the form without comment.
content.summary: Fast moving light, no tail.

content.detailedDescription: I going through a forest with my air soft gun. i began hearing children screaming, then laughing. i looked over towards the water of the lake nearby and noticed a black helicopter hovering in place. i took my binoculars. i looked at the helicopter and discovered an insignia from the united states air force. i thought "what? why is there a us air force unit in canadian airspace?" and then i noticed a small orb about 20 ft. from the aircraft. i began hearing gunfire and dropped to the ground. a second orb caught my eye from behind the helicopter and more gunfire. when the orbs disappeared i ran from the forest and home. i haven't spoken to anyone of this incident and don't plan on it unless it is from mufon.
content.summary: Fast, noises before, strange feeling.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of 10/8/2014, my wife and i were at folly beach, sc enjoying a stroll on the beach under a full moon. there were no clouds in the sky, stars were out (but very faint, probably due to the brightness of the moon). we were sitting at the folly beach pier looking toward the moon which was in the northeast. to the west of the moon toward the opening of the charleston harbor, i saw three orange/yellowish “fireballs” in a triangular formation (one on the left, one on the right and one on the top). i pointed it out to my wife and she noticed it as well then the images disappeared. the first to disappear was the eastern most light, followed by the western most then the top one. the entire sighting lasted for about 2-3 seconds, just long enough to spot it, point it out and then it was gone. 
we thought right away that maybe it was fireworks, but we saw no signs of a trail or evidence of the lights fizzling out like a falling light would. we then thought it may have been a plane, but the lights were too far spaced out. we sat there for a few minutes discussing what we saw and decided to record what we saw on our voice recorder on our phone. we continued to monitor the sky around us, but did not see it again or anything that resembled what we saw.
we finally went along the pier and asked a couple people (fishermen and families walking the pier) if they saw it and nobody else witnessed what we saw. someone joked that they must not have been drinking what we did, but we had only had water and sweet tea earlier in the evening; no drugs, alcohol or medicine that would have been a factor.
content.summary: Three lights appeared in a triangle formation above charleston harbor, then disappeared, 3 seconds tops

content.detailedDescription: These pics were taken by ex law enforcement and i promised not to give his info so he sent me the pics and here i am.  he was gardening and was from the corner of his eye and snapped 2 pics before it flew off.
content.summary: Triange saw 2 pics taken from cell phone

content.detailedDescription:
This is a case of a multiple witness sighting that took place on thursday, october 2, 2014 
from salt lake city to vernal, utah
content.summary: On october 2, 2014 there was a mass sighting from salt lake city to vernal utah

content.detailedDescription:
Unusual sighting.

1st. noticed three lights in sky while walking dogs. on return 15 minutes later still there. decided to take pictures since it seemed an odd configuration of planets since the lights did not flicker.

2nd. picture 1 shows the three lights and a tree in background. the problem is that the tree is behind me when taking the picture as if it was reflected off of something. my neighbor to the west of me does not have any trees in his yard. i only had a palm tree in yard as shown.

3rd. decided to blow up subsequent pictures as provided. concluded that they were not planets but the ligths were attached to metalic object stationary in the sky making no noise and that the object was very close to the neighborhood.

4th. odd shape - does not match a regualr ufo type.
content.summary: 3 lights in triangular formation

content.detailedDescription: My friend states that at approximately 8:00 p.M. on october 8, 2014, she was trying to take pictures of the moon.  the first picture shows a strange anomaly in clouds in front of the moon.  she says that she saw no white lights (2nd and 3rd pics) until she looked back at the pictures.  there were only clouds in the sky.  i asked her if she heard any noise and she said she stated no.
content.summary: Picture of moon turned out very strange - white anamoly

content.detailedDescription: My mother had just put me to bed. my aunts and uncles were all at a cabin we went to every year. my mom and them were having a a seance, i overheard. i was in bed for a while when i got scared. i got up and was going to get my mom right next door. when i opened the door i saw multi- colored lights hoovering over hills in the distance. i actually froze. i was terrified, i stood there just staring at it. i was too scared to move. it just hovered.Made no sound. i don't remember what gave me the courage, but i finally ran to get my mom, tried to get her to come look at it real fast, but, of course she didn't believe me and took her time going outside and didn't see it.Unfortunately i did not see it leave. now much older regret not waiting.
content.summary: Hills of austin, tx

content.detailedDescription: 10/8/14 approximately 8:30 pm i observed a very bright red light hovering in the sky to the south east of my home. the light pulsed and blinked at random, no pattern. the light also changed in intensity from very bright to barely visible then back to very bright. at least 3 times brighter than any marker lights on an airplane. the aircraft the started moving east to west, a few miles at least, then hovered for about 15 minutes. it then began to move back and forth in a north/south direction for about 5 minutes. maybe a half mile distance back and forth. then hovered. then it moved back south, hovered then did the north/south movement again. it then moved very slowly in a west direction, stopped after about a mile or two then started heading north. it traveled about 5 miles very quickly before it came to a stop and hovered. it sat there for about 20 minutes then seemed to split into two bright red lights. short after the split a small dull white light designed quickly from the clouds on a direct path for the red lights. the red lights seemed to adjust it position to avoid a collision with the smaller white light. shortly after that the red lights seemed to have turned off. nothing after that. during the incident the crafts speed varied widely from very slow to much faster than any aircraft in the sky. i couldn't hear any sound coming from it, but that could of been due to distance. the weather was fair with only a few light clouds in the sky. i live near detroit metro airport so i am accustomed so seeing all sort of craft in the sky at all times of the day and night. this was very unlike anything i have ever seen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very bright red light over wayne county michigan.

content.detailedDescription: Observed 5 orbs star like.Changing direction,changing altitude,dissapearing then reappearing,2 were leaving comet like tail,changing direction and altitude also saw jet(jet like) craft fire afterburners and climb fast and head toward largest orb(also biggest,highest and brightest orb,which never moved,just vanished after 5 min) then lost sight of that jet like craft never saw anything like these things really cool! also witnessed by 24 yr old son
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw orbsappear then dissappear,some had tails comet like,then saw black jet like craft fire afterburners while ascending to largest orb

content.detailedDescription:
the second night of the high park fire in fort collins, co estimated around 11:30pm-12:30am, i was out on my porch looking northwest where the smoke from the high park fire was.  i seen one craft, i am guessing disc shaped, hovering over what appeared to be, the southern end of the fire. the craft hoovered for well over a minute.  i seen a second craft not far from the first, but not two together. i seen the first craft slowely move before seeing a second craft in a different spot.  i cannot say if there was only one or two because of the movement they make. it lasted approx. two minutes or less before disappearing.  i spotted a same light off to the east momentarily after i lost sight of the western light. this happened over two years ago, i do not remember the details clearly, however i know what i seen and what it was.  about 4 weeks later, something happened that confirmed to me...What i saw.  a voluntary fire fighter showed me a photo of a burn area, just yards away from the forest  burn area that they could not explain.  the photo showed a perfectly rounded burn area that no forest fire could have created and he felt it was so strange that he took a picture of it. i broke down and told him of my sighting when i saw the photo.  he had nothing more to share.
my reaction when i saw the ufo:  i have always been hesitant to report any sightings because i am a private person and when you are told as a child in the 1960's, after you see a craft hoovering on top of your telephone pole, to keep a lid on it; no one talks about it!  i have seen at least 10 ufo's in my lifetime but i love the night sky. it becomes a part of your knowledge. i decited it's time to take the lid off for more personal reasons.
content.summary: 2 objects hovering over the south side of the high park fire west of fort collins co on the second night of the fire .  estimated time between 12 pm and 1 am.

content.detailedDescription:
1 walking sorry i cant spell to good i don't right call me 
i also saw one land in 1990 between ca and or
content.summary: Hoverd then went strate up in to space

content.detailedDescription: I made a report of this a week ago, but the photo attachments didnt work so im trying again. my wife and i found these 5 incredible daytime disc polaroid photos in an old photo album belonging to her grandfather, who was a captain in the air force and was stationed in albuquerque nm from 1961-1965. the man seen in the picture pointing to the object is my wife's grandfather. i scanned these photos in and blew them up and they are very compelling. if it was a hoax, it's a good one.
content.summary: 5 historical photos of amazing daytime disc found in air force captain's photoalbum

content.detailedDescription: I was at my room watching tv and around 11:00 pm i felt a sleep suddenly i felt light coming into my room throught the window so i got up and open the window and look at these tree huge balls of mercury or liquid metal is the best way i could discrbe it. then i beam of light hit me and instantly i was transported inside this object. there was two human like entities one was a very tall female with this white tight body suit and she was in front of this long keyboard but very advance .....She was pushing these cristal rods and in front of her was a huge screen.....At the same time she was doing this i was paralyze by this older male entity that was holding my arm. this older male entity also was in  a white suit and i notist that his hair was realy white and long this was my best discription from the liitle that i could see. he was telling me how humanity is destroying our bio sphere and how delicate and unbalance is becoming in witch we will  be facing a world caticlysm in a near future  and we humans in order to survive this coming  event we  are going have to go underground . while this was being said to me it was also shown on the huge screen the projection of our pas , present , and the future. i startte goin into some sort of panic and instantly i was back in my bed room looking out the window and these huge mercury balls disintegrate into the top of a mounting located about 600 feets from my house. i always believe that we are not alone in the universe for unknown reasons i just felt this way. however , i never knew  that i was going to have this amazing expierence in my entire life. what really blew me away was that i had credit card with a amount of $ 14.95 and this is where it realy get strange ......I was driving by a unknown force or what ever you want to called that made me get in my vehicle the next day and i went to plaza las america located in rio piedras and when into a bookstore and told one of the employees .........Where is the section for ufo phenomenon.....Once i got to the section i just pick out this book call alien encounters with the unexplained and the cost of this book was the exact amount on money that was in my credit card. i recieved this card by this book store a few weeks before this event. once i got home and open this book i realize that in one of the pages was a illustration of the entities and part of the inside of this object that i was taking into and also the screen. i believe that this is reshoring that everything that happen to me with this entities was real. i have never came forward with my expierence untild know.
content.summary: Tree huge mercury balls

content.detailedDescription:
While staying in rented house in plantation on sgi i first observed an orange sphere at airplane altitudes moving in from the gulf horizontally across the island  from south to north.  as i watched it the orange glow faded but i could still see the faint outline of the object in the full moon.   it reminded me of the lighted chinese new year balloons except that it appeared to be traveling on a course and was a sphere and much higher in the air.  i took a short clip of this object and really had no ideal what it was.   i then walked to the beach as the moon was full and very bright.  as i looked towards the west end of the island out about 20 deg from the coast line past the govt. cut a much larger orange sphere (closer to me than the first one)suddenly appeared by blinking on then off twice.  this one was also at a much lower elevation closer to the water .  this one definitely got my attention i hung around a few mins more but saw nothing else.  i have seen maritime flares and these were not flares.   the second sighting blinked on and off very quickly from
full light to darkness like flipping a switch.  first sighting about 8:20pm the second around 8:40pm
content.summary: Saw 2 lights within 20 mins glowing orange spheres

content.detailedDescription:
I was babysitting at a farm. the child went dow for her nap. i went outside and saw it hovering just over the cornfield, just beneath the treetops. i ran out to get a closer look. i was very excited about the possibility of it being a spacecraft.  it was a huge saucer. as i got close to the field, it started moving smoothly and very slowly away from me over the cornfield without gaining altitude at first. i tried to follow, but realized i had left a child in the house alone. i stopped following and turned to go back to the farmhouse. when i got back to the house, i turned to see where it was. it was just leaving my sight, going up over a distant stand of trees. i went into the house.

it was very quiet, i didn't notice any lines in the skin for doors or windows. there were no lights, but it was daylight. at my closest, i was about 50 feet from it. the corn was about 5-6 ft. tall, so it was july or august.

it looked like brushed aluminum....Maybe darker. very smooth, but not chrome shiny smooth. i was a trekkie, so i was very excited.
content.summary: I was babysitting at a farm. i went outside & saw it hovering just over the cornfield, just beneath the treetops. i ran out to get closer look. it was a huge saucer. as i approached, it started smoothly & very slowly away from me over the cornfield.

content.detailedDescription: I just got off work and was driving home when i saw the 4 lights.  3 of them in a triangle and 1 following.  i watched them travel slowly across the sky in what direction i believe was north east.  i lost visual when i got close to home.  i got out of my car to see if i could spot them again.  standing on the street i saw 1 of the lights traveling to what i believe was sw.  as it past over it dropped of sparks like it was on fire and embers were falling off of it.  the object traveled fairly slow and then disappeared as if it burned out.  i can say for sure they were not planes or stars.  i also saw a plane flying the other direction of the single orb.  after it disappeared i came inside and filed this report.
content.summary: 4 balls of orange light, 3 in triangle 1 behind, moving slow.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from a swim practice when i stopped at the light on the corner of 31st and church st.  in the sky, far in the distance, i could see three airplanes skimming across the sky going various directions.  i knew these were airplanes due to the trails they left as they streaked across the sky.  these were quite a distance away as the only light i could see coming from them was the reflection of the sun off the planes. the sun was on the verge of setting, though not quite down.  there was another stationary light poised above the sun which i thought was a planet, possibly mercury.  then, from the left came an object that just appeared to be a light a bit brighter than the airplanes, but not much.  the sun was bouncing off of the object so i couldn't tell if it emitted its own light or not.  there was also another apparently stationary light just behind and above the direction the second object came from.  at first the object traveled in a straight line headed north, so i thought it could be a satellite or the space station but then it turned downward, made a misshapen 'u' shape then went straight again only to reverse back to the left all the while not continuing in a straight line, more of a jagged line.  i never saw the other two objects move from their positions.  the stop light turned green and i turned the corner, so the object was out of sight.  as soon as i got to the light at 31st and main i looked for the object again but houses were in the way, the time lapse between the turn and the next stop light was not more than a minute.  i turned onto main and continued home after roughly one minute, but never saw the object again, in fact all of the lights besides the three airplanes were gone.
content.summary: Strange light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to walk my dog during the middle of a tv show i'd normally never interrupt to walk him.  the dog was asleep, i made the conscious decision to walk him in the middle of the show for no apparent reason.  i always check out stars, planets, constellations, aircraft, etc, during my walks.  where light pollution isn't an issue especially.

i first thought it could be an aircraft whose flashing light never came back on.  i had spotted an aircraft to the north flying south.  i also thought a star or meteor.  but a meteor more than likely would have left a trail.  most aircraft have the blinking lights.  

i saw the light which appeared as a star much brighter than anything else in the sky even brighter than the aircraft lights spotted going north to south.

no reactions no sounds from either the object or other craft.  nothing else out of the ordinary.  i was not sleepy or under the influence of any drugs or hallucinogen's.  

i lost sight when it disappeared suddenly.  i only saw the light for a second or two.  

i'm only reporting it because to me it was unidentified.  i can normally explain everything i've seen (except for once around the age of ten when i saw either a supermoon or very large ufo).  i'm not an astronomer but i am a star gazer and i've read astronomy books since i was seven or eight.  my grandfather sent books on astronomy but most were college level and although i couldn't understand everything.  i knew all the planets and one book even had an early map of mars. 

as i've said i didn't expect to see anything out of the ordinary.  it may have been nothing.  but was not identified by me. or my experience with sky gazing.  i wouldn't have reported it had i not gone out when i did during a time i normally wouldn't.  namely during one of my favorite tv shows premiere of the fall season.
content.summary: Flash of light.  like a star. no trail like meteor.  had already observed aircraft in sky with flashing lights nowhere near the object in question.
